section.para: This extensions allows to specify some zone attributes for AnyTone devices.

example.programlisting: zones: - id: zone1 name: Zone Name A: [ch1, ...] B: [ch2, ...] anytone: hidden: false

section.para: The AnyTone zone extension is a mapping named anytone. It contains the device specific settings for that zone.
For now, there is only one attribute allowing to hide the zone from the zone list in the radio.

listitem.para: If true, the zone is hidden in the zone list on the radio.
